DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to compare the pharmacokinetics of nebulized amikacin administered with three vibrating mesh nebulizers coupled with a single limb circuit bilevel ventilator in healthy volunteers. Following our previous in vitro study, our hypotheses are that the pharmacokinetics varies among the devices tested and that a most efficient device can be identified.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics of Nebulized Amikacin in Non Invasive Ventilated Healthy Volunteers.
DOC.criteria: No contraindication of amikacin Written informed consent Negative pregnant test (for women) History of respiratory disease History of renal disease History of otological disease
